attributes.action: Create a law called "Shaming the flag." This will enable those who commits a serious crime or a crime that by its nature will defame or shame the people of Britian as a whole whilst aboroad to be charged with "Shaming the Flag" once they return to Britian.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that there should be a new crime created so as to cover such action. 

This crime should be called "Shaming the flag" and it should be applied to any British Nationals who act in such a way whilst abroad so as to bring shame on the British people as a whole. 

This law should apply to those people who get so drunk abroad that they commit a crime worthy of imprisonment. 

It would also cover those people who commit any serious crime abroad, such as rape, murder etc, whether they are drunk sober or otherwise. Alos included in the category of serious crime would be Drug trafficing and Hooliganism of any sort.

This crime should and should be applied to those whe desecrate British war memorials on British soil. It should also apply to those who do the same thing to war memorials aboad - whether they be commemorating the sacrifice of British Soldiers, or the sacrifice of Foreign Soldiers.
